venue.name: The Haunted Ship At The USS Salem

item.description:
Full Speed Ahead Car Show Music and Cars- The USS Salem Quincy MA

This Meetup has it all. and it is for the whole family..( incase you have little ones). Ask yourself how many live music venues have you been to that have this.

-A whole lotta great bands playing right underneath the Big Guns on Deck.

-Dancing on Deck

-One of the biggest car shows in Quincy.

Pre 1964 Hot Rods, Custom and , Motorcycle show

-Vintage Girl Studio 2013 Cover Model search.

( Although Granny could be a model I don't think that is what they are talking about)

-Tours of the USS Salem  haunted ship.

- Yes there is beer there

Hey we hit 1000 members a while back. So why not make this the meetups of all meetups.  Bring your cameras..  Definitely a lot of camera candy going to be there....

Live Music playing on the stern of the ship to include:
-Lenny Lashely's Gang of one
-H-bombs
-Juke Joint Joint Rhythm Rockers
-Whiskey Kill


Kids $8  Adults $12

http://hauntedship.com/flash/index.html check this out..
item.name: Full Speed Ahead Car Show Music and Cars- The USS Salem Quincy MA
